title: Client crashes
body: Ever since the newest patch my client keeps disconnecting during the load screen. It's not an issue with my connection or my computer as I have tested them both thoroughly. And now that I know it's not my fault I log in today to see that I have been placed in a lower que with LeaveBuster because of YOUR client crashes. This is not right and I've already been told I can't get my league points back so what are you guys doing to fix this???????

replies.body:
[Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)or LP is not something we adjust, and these lower priority queues only occur after multiple leaves.  These penalties are treated equally regardless of it being intentional or not because they cause negative experiences.  

I would be more than happy to help resolve whatever is causing you to disconnect.   I would need a lot more details on this issue!  When exactly is the issue happening, and what do you see on your screen?  For example, is it a black screen, a freeze, or nothing at all?  Do you receive an error messages and what do you see?  Let me know!
